title.narrative: 2019 Sankalp Africa - Platform for Innovation, Entrepreneurship & Impact Investing

description.narrative: • Development of the Forum content, in particular as it pertains to the role of academia and technical/vocational training organizations in cultivating youth entrepreneurship. The Foundation and Sankalp will co-develop sessions on: (i) designing business incubation programs within an academic environment; (ii) linking young innovators with corporates for grassroots innovations; and (iii) tapping the potential of the gig economy for youth employment. • Provide scholarships to young African entrepreneurs and manage travel logistics to attend the Summit and participate in structured networking opportunities. • A post-event report will capture learnings from the Forum.
